news.title: Lammy hopes plan to recognise Palestinian state 'will get ceasefire'
news.summary: The government has announced it will recognise a Palestinian state unless Israel agrees to end the crisis.

news.title: Bowen: UK move to recognise Palestinian state is a diplomatic crowbar to revive peace process
news.summary: Such a move would be a major departure from UK foreign policy.

news.title: Missing Brady memoir 'could hold new clues to Moors murders'
news.summary: A manuscript by one of the Moors murderers could indicate where missing victim is buried, it is claimed.

news.title: Rape crisis centre to launch single sex-only meetings after trans row
news.summary: The new group will run alongside an existing service which allows trans and non-binary people to take part

news.title: Ozzy Osbourne's home city set to say final goodbye
news.summary: Thousands are expected to watch his funeral procession make its way through Birmingham on Wednesday.

news.title: 'I was a shopping addict - it needs to be taken more seriously'
news.summary: People with experience of compulsive buying say more NHS help is needed to tackle the issue.

news.title: The Papers:  Starmer 'rewarding Hamas' and 'Labour's low blow'
news.summary: The PM's decision to recognise a Palestinian state unless Israel ends the Gaza crisis dominates Wednesday's papers.

news.title: I've stopped life-saving medication says man exhausted by fight for NHS care
news.summary: Tim Hull, who has a rare neurological condition, says his quality of life is "very, very low".

news.title: YouTube to be included in Australia's teen social media ban
news.summary: The Australian government says the world-first ban is aimed at protecting youth from online harm.

news.title: Outcry after German zoo culled baboons due to overcrowding
news.summary: The zoo in Nuremberg said it knew many people would be "upset" or "infuriated" by the decision.
